original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord, after King Zedekiah had made a covenant with all the people in Jerusalem to make a proclamation of liberty to them,
korean_text: 시드기야 왕이 예루살렘에 있는 모든 백성과 한 가지로 하나님 앞에서 계약을 맺고 자유를 선포한 후에 여호와께로부터 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord,
after King Zedekiah had made a covenant
with all the people in Jerusalem
to make a proclamation of liberty to them,
